loginPage.announcement: Make sure you are visiting {link} to prevent any phishing attacks
loginPage.noPlugins: Never install any browser plug-ins that claim to be associated with Tomochain
loginPage.noPhoneCalls: Never make any phone calls to anyone that claims to be a Tomochain representative
loginPage.noOfficialStaffs: Never make transactions or send funds to anyone who claims to be a member of Tomochain support
loginPage.noDisclosure: Never disclose your password, private keys or other authentication elements to anyone, including Tomochain support
loginPage.loginMethods: Vui lòng chọn phương thức đăng nhập
app.title: Welcome to React
app.introduction: To get started, edit {code} and save to reload.
